question: Kindly let me know where is it mentioned in Quran that men cannot wear gold & tattoe body. Very sorry, I really need to know because I've got explain to my husaband. Thank You.

Almighty Allah Ta'ala said, '. And abstain from whatever the Prophet
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) of Allah prohibits you from.'

Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) prohibited men from using gold and
tattooing. (Mishkaat vol.2)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
